subject: [Radiance-general] Daysim Electirc Lighting energy calculation
body:
Hi!


Maybe a silly idea, but as long as you are not looking at open plan
office spaces... Are the remaining 37 days accounting for (medical,
vacation, ...) leaves? Just thought about that as I am leaving for a
three weeks holiday tonight :-D

Cheers, Lars.
